thread.title: Looking back and ahead at BYU's football schedule following win over Connecticut
thread.title_full: Looking back and ahead at BYU's football schedule following win over Connecticut | Deseret News

author: Jeff Call
title: Looking back and ahead at BYU's football schedule following win over Connecticut
text:
BYU pulled away in the fourth quarter to beat UConn 30-13 on Friday and will now face East Carolina this week.
Upcoming Games BYU Football BYU football stats & schedule East Carolina @ BYU Lavell Edwards Stadium, Provo Oct. 10, 5:30 p.m. 5  Days   3  Hrs   26  Mins   49  Secs More Coverage After win, BYU looking to improve BYU'S SCHEDULE 
Sept. 5 — at Nebraska, won 33-28
Sept. 12 — BOISE STATE, won 35-24
Sept. 19 — at UCLA, lost 24-23
Sept. 26 — at Michigan, lost 31-0
Oct. 2 — CONNECTICUT, won 30-13
Oct. 10 — EAST CAROLINA, 5:30 p.m. (ESPNU)
Oct. 16 — CINCINNATI, 6 p.m. (ESPN)
Oct. 24 — WAGNER, 1 p.m. (BYUtv)
Nov. 6 — at San Jose State, 9:30 p.m. (CBSSN)
Nov. 14 — vs. Missouri, TBA
Nov. 21 — FRESNO STATE, TBA
Nov. 28 — at Utah State, 1:30 p.m. (CBSSN)
All times Mountain 
BYU pulled away in the fourth quarter to beat UConn 30-13 on Friday and will now face East Carolina this week. Here's a look of how each team on the Cougars' schedule performed over the weekend:
NEBRASKA (2-3): Lost to Illinois, 14-13 . Up next: Saturday vs. Wisconsin (3-2).
BOISE STATE (4-1): Beat Hawaii, 55-0 . Up next: Saturday at Colorado State (2-3).
UCLA (4-1): Lost to Arizona State, 38-23 . Up next: Bye.
MICHIGAN (4-1): Beat Maryland, 28-0 . Up next: Saturday vs. Northwestern (5-0).
CONNECTICUT (2-3): Lost to BYU, 30-13 . Up next: Saturday at Central Florida (0-5).
EAST CAROLINA (3-2): Beat SMU, 49-23 . Up next: Saturday at BYU (3-2).
CINCINNATI (3-2): Beat Miami (Fla.), 34-23 . Up next: Bye.
WAGNER (0-4): Lost to Robert Morris, 9-6 . Up next: Saturday at Columbia (0-3).
SAN JOSE STATE (2-3): Lost to Auburn, 35-21 . Up next: Saturday at UNLV (2-3).
MISSOURI (4-1): Beat South Carolina, 24-10 . Up next: Saturday vs. Florida (5-0).
FRESNO STATE (1-4): Lost to San Diego State, 21-7 . Up next: Saturday vs. Utah State (3-2).
UTAH STATE (3-2): Beat Colorado State, 33-18 . Up next: Saturday at Fresno State (1-4).
